document_data.mainbody:
halass Huntsilver was a queen of Cormyr and the wife of King Dhalmass Obarskyr, who ruled from 1210 DR to 1227 DR. She was the mother of King Palaghard II.
A member of the Huntsilver family, Jhalass was the wife of King Dhalmass Obarskyr. They had four children Proster (born 1213 DR, died 1222 DR, aged 9), Palaghard (born 1214 DR), Elliira (born 1218 DR), and Pelara (born 1220 DR).
After the port city of Marsember rebelled, King Dhalmass seized it back in the Year of the Wall, 1227 DR.
